content.raw: The `Virtual STIX` origin has not been updated to coincide with the revised origin in the tile set worlds.  The `Virtual STIX` world is better preparation and testing for a systems-track experiment or general robustness experiment for a virtual submission solution.  There are a number of differences you will encounter in the `Virtual STIX` environment that are not present in the virtual challenge tile set.  The terrain ruggedness in the `Virtual STIX` can impact your robot’s control and state estimation differently than the tile set worlds.  Also, communication is not modeled in the `Virtual STIX` environment \(to my knowledge\).
content.html: The Virtual STIX origin has not been updated to coincide with the revised origin in the tile set worlds. The Virtual STIX world is better preparation and testing for a systems-track experiment or general robustness experiment for a virtual submission solution. There are a number of differences you will encounter in the Virtual STIX environment that are not present in the virtual challenge tile set. The terrain ruggedness in the Virtual STIX can impact your robot’s control and state estimation differently than the tile set worlds. Also, communication is not modeled in the Virtual STIX environment (to my knowledge).
